author: Rainer Winkler

comments.message: Hi Rainer, I've used your concepts to try find a material that would disperse heat from inside through outside cooling.  Currently researching graphene.
Hi Anthony, thanks for telling. I wish you success.

description: This is not an innovative idea, but fast and cheap to implement, so I post it here. Even if a new cooling technique is invented, it will work better if all other possible actions are performed.
summary: The heat transfer from PPE to air is highly dependent on the air currents around the PPE. Increase ventilation around health care worker in PPE to improve the heat transfer.
title: Increase venting around PPE to improve cooling
